name: tableCustomSQLQuery
description: Test if a custom SQL returns a number of rows within a specified range

parameterDefinition.name: sqlExpression
parameterDefinition.description: SQL expression to run against the table

parameterDefinition.name: strategy
parameterDefinition.description: Strategy to use to run the custom SQL query (i.e. `SELECT COUNT(<col>)` or `SELECT <col> (defaults to ROWS)

parameterDefinition.name: minThreshold
parameterDefinition.description: Minimum threshold to use to determine if the test passes or fails (defaults to 0).

parameterDefinition.name: maxThreshold
parameterDefinition.description: Maximum threshold to use to determine if the test passes or fails (defaults to 0).
